Detailed Description

The core data storage object.

The Object stores several datatypes(described in db_types_t). You will use this class heavily whenever developing a program using the database.

Member Function Documentation

int Object::as_int (  ) 

returns the internal data as int.

this will NOT convert the string into any form. it will fail.

Returns:
int value of internal data

str Object::as_string (  ) 

returns the internal data as a string.

if the Object represents an int, this will return the string representation of the int, eg int(5)=string("5")

Returns:
string value of internal data

the type
